node.name: Eclipse-Subversion Plugin integrated with a total ALM solution - Easy!Flow
node.shortdescription:
This plugin can be used as an eclipse subversion plugin, further more, it is tightly integrated with Easy!Flow - a total Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) solution. With this plugin and Easy!Flow server, team members can finish all their collaborative development activities (including source code control, requirement management, defect tracking, project management, document control, dashboard monitor, SQA report, etc.) within the eclipse IDE.

Easy!Flow also provides a web based portal and stand alone SCM Client.

For more detailed info, please visit the site http://www.ez-sw.com

*************************************************************
*FREE DOWNLOAD!*

Total ALM solution Easy!Flow FREE download for small teams is now available. Support is included. Download and try it for FREE now. Visit http://www.ez-sw.com/Easy_Flow_Detail.html

*************************************************************
